results.title: Compound Danshen Dripping Pill inhibits hypercholesterolemia/atherosclerosis-induced heart failure in ApoE and LDLR dual deficient mice via multiple mechanisms
results.text_hl: We also attempted to unveil the involved anti-@<m>DISEASE_Heart_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006335 @@@heart injury@@@ mechanisms of CDDP and if CDDP can block @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@.
